title: While the new Skarner passive is a little sketchy, let's looks at a different Skarner change...
body:
_Passive - Crystal Spires
(Removed) Crystallizing Sting (moved thematically to E - Fracture)_

_E - Fracture:
(Added) Enemies hit by Fracture are afflicted with Crystal Venom for 5 seconds, causing Skarner’s next basic attack against them to deal 25/50/75/100/125 additional physical damage and stun them for 1 second._

So... we're back to relying on a skill shot to be our only form of gap closing?

It may not seem like much since Skarner doesn't have to stack his passive anymore and it just immediately stuns someone, but I still don't like the idea of a skill-shot being the only way to catch someone as a champ without a gap closer. It feels too.... {{champion:2}} 

Thoughts, summoners?

replies.body: What do you mean? Ever since they removed the slowing on his Q, his E has always used to gapclose. Early game, if he doesn't E someone, he'll never be able to keep up and then hit them with THREE Q's and then autoattack for a .5 second stun. Also he wouldn't be able to do that for another 6 seconds. He has alot more sticking power now.

I just always got things like ghost, ghostblade and phage. I wouldn't rely too much on his E since I would be able to just run down someone anyways.

But doesn't this change mean that if you want to stun multiple people that you would need to hit them all in a line? 

Skarner's Q would just apply in an AoE.

{{item:3025}}  and {{item:3071}} Can solve this problem both offer more stick power.

Also the new Skarner have more AD in his moveset (40% AD ratio unchaeged Q and 40% AD ratio in his charged Q, 80% AD ratio).

Also the Armor shred helps a lot to make more dmg, I'm Skarner main, and these changes are not bad at all.

I'll miss all his MS buff, but now he have a more oriented AD pattern and items like Black Cleaver and IBG are amazing on hIM.

{{item:3025}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3709}} {{item:3111}}

And some of the new items like Sterak's Gage or Titanic Hydra's can be a good items on him too. Because Skarner is one of the champs with the highness base AD (a curios data is that Darius, Mordekaiser, Skarner and Garen are now the champs with the highess base AD).
